Lyrics: Da così dotta man sei stato fatto
Direct Translation: See translation at Choral Public Domain Library (LINK: http://www2.cpdl.org/wiki/index.php/Da_cos%C3%AC_dotta_man_(Giovanni_Pierluigi_da_Palestrina))
Poetic Translation: By such a skillful hand were you effected,

Lyrics: Che io non saprei ridir se viva sei
Poetic Translation: I wondered if you were a living beauty,

Lyrics: O se fai dolce inganni agli occhi miei.
Poetic Translation: Or if my eyes conspired to delude me.
